name: market for unreinforced concrete, 15MPa | unreinforced concrete, 15MPa | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/26165/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for 'unreinforced concrete, 15MPa', in the the geography of Switzerland. This is a generic market; the suppliers of this market make available this generic product by redirecting a part of the production of several more specific products.;Local market data set for Swiss conditions based on the local production of ready-mixed concrete The transport distances in this market are taken from a model based on statistics on transport of goods in Switzerland (Valsasina, 2016, Default transport data per commodity group for Switzerland, ecoinvent, www.ecoinvent.org).;The product "concrete, normal" represents a generic dataset that was created to facilitate users who do not have specific information about the type of concrete. In the ecoinvent database, for all geographies outside Switzerland, concrete, normal represents concrete with strengths between 20 and 35MPa. In the case of Switzerland, concrete, normal represents B35/25 (based on SIA 162), which is between C20/25 and C25/30, based on SIA 262.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'unreinforced concrete, 15MPa', within the geography of Switzerland.

This activity ends with the supply of 'unreinforced concrete, 15MPa', to the consumers of this product. Transport is included. Product losses during transportation are assumed negligible and are therefore not included.
category: C:Manufacturing/23:Manufacture of other non-metallic mineral products/239:Manufacture of non-metallic mineral products n.e.c./2395:Manufacture of articles of concrete, cement and plaster

processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: Assumed transport distance of 50 km based on expert judgement for CH, considering the local production of ready-mixed concrete

exchanges.description: The transport distances in this market are taken from a model based on statistics on transport of goods in Switzerland (Valsasina, 2016, Default transport data per commodity group for Switzerland, ecoinvent, www.ecoinvent.org). The value is then multiplied for the density of the product, which is specified in the exchange properties.
